title: Handmade Leather Goods | Frank Clegg Leatherworks
description: Frank Clegg, handmade leather goods are crafted in America using sustainably sourced leather. Our craftsmanship is guaranteed for life. Family-owned since 1970
cleaned_text: 1970 Welcome to Frank Clegg Leatherworks, we invite you to discover our collection of handmade leather goods, handcrafted on the South Coast of Massachusetts. Our fine leather goods are expertly come across a company that is clearly guided by a desire to produce the very best. Frank Clegg, to me, is the perfect example of such a company. I can't wait to get my hands on another bag, I'm sure it won't be long." GIVE A pride ourselves on having the highest standards in each of these areas to craft fine leather goods
